stopAt(ContextProvider, CallStackFrame, SmartSteppingFilter) - Method in class org.netbeans.spi.debugger.jpda.SmartSteppingCallback
This is an enhanced version of former SmartSteppingCallback.stopHere(org.netbeans.spi.debugger.ContextProvider, org.netbeans.api.debugger.jpda.JPDAThread, org.netbeans.api.debugger.jpda.SmartSteppingFilter) method, which is called during stepping through debugged application.
